All required tests passed. Merging the revert.

@ahmetb, as per our internal discussions, the problem you're seeing here is a problem with the grpc-go API.  In general, we consider it completely safe to add a new method to an existing RPC service definition; in all languages other than go, this does not cause build breakage.  I suggest filing this as a bug against grpc-go.
